site.name: AutoShow
site.description: Transform audio and video content into professional show notes using advanced AI. Support for multiple languages, custom templates, and seamless integration.

home.title: AutoShow - Generate Show Notes with AI
home.description: Transform audio and video content into professional show notes using advanced AI. Support for multiple languages, custom templates, and seamless integration.

collections.title: Collections - Organize Your Content
collections.description: Organize and manage your audio content collections with AutoShow. Create custom categories and efficiently browse your generated show notes.

history.title: Processing History - Track Your Progress
history.description: View your complete processing history and manage all your generated show notes in one place. Track progress and access previous results easily.

showNotes.title: Generated Show Notes
showNotes.description: AI-generated professional show notes with timestamps, key points, and structured content for your audio and video files.

docs.title: Documentation - AutoShow API Guide
docs.description: Complete guide to AutoShow API, integration examples, and best practices for automated content processing.

HomePage.title: Import Media
HomePage.description: Add YouTube videos, podcasts, or local files to your media library

import.title: Import Content
import.description: Enter a YouTube URL, podcast RSS feed, or upload local files
import.uploadTitle: Drop files here or click to browse
import.uploadDescription: Supports: MP4, MP3, WAV, MOV, AVI (Max 100MB each)

messages.successDescription: Content has been processed and is ready for transcription.
